I have three graded T206 lots for sale on eBay.  I'm trying to raise some cash, so I will accept reasonable "best offers" on any of these lots from Net54ers.  My preference would be no paypal, only checks or money orders.  My email is [url]agonzdude@yahoo.com[/url]


LOT A:  [url]http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=260465275528[/url]

Lovely Day...
